entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Bancroft
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:17 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -9.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Bancroft 1:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
Temperature: -9.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 98.8 kPa rising
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: SSW 17 km/h gust 41 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this evening. Local blowing snow this evening. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
